fonctions_camera.py

1 #!/usr/bin/env python
2 
3 import rospy
4 from sensor_msgs.msg import CompressedImage
5 from niryo_robot_vision.image_functions import compress_image
6 
7 
8 def generate_msg_from_image(img, compression_quality=90):
9  """
10  Generate ROS CompressedImage message from an OpenCV Image
11  :param img: OpenCV Image
12  :param compression_quality: integer between 1 - 100. The higher it is, the less information will be lost,
13  but the heavier the compressed image will be
14  :return: success, msg
15  """
16  result, compressed_img = compress_image(img, quality=compression_quality)
17  if not result:
18  rospy.logerr("Failed to generate CompressedImage message from image")
19  return False, None
20 
21  msg = CompressedImage()
22  msg.header.stamp = rospy.Time.now()
23  msg.format = "jpg"
24  msg.data = compressed_img
25 
26  return True, msg
